author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of Madurai District Central Cooperative Bank Staff Union staged a demonstration here on Thursday in support of their various demands, including creation of a pension fund.

They demanded payment of pension for all existing employees of cooperative banks and enhancement of ex-gratia payment of Rs. 3,500 to Rs. 10,000 for all employees and those who had retired after September 21, 2010. Their other demands included filling up of over 6,000 vacancies, according to a press release from S. Nagarajan, general secretary.
title: Bank union stages protest
